thread.title: 'I spend half the year hating myself and wanting to die': How SAD affects women
thread.title_full: 'I spend half the year hating myself and wanting to die': How SAD affects women

author: Rachel Argyle
title: 'I spend half the year hating myself and wanting to die': How SAD affects women
text: Women's Health 'I spend half the year hating myself and wanting to die': How SAD affects women Seasonal Affective Disorder or SAD has been diagnosed in more than two million people in the UK - the majority women. As the clocks go back, Rachel Argyle reports - and we list four light boxes to try Around 80 per cent of Seasonal Affective Disorder sufferers are women Photo: Â© KIVILCIM PINAR By Rachel Argyle
